mapper.sql: id, device_category_id, department_id, batch, number, model, name, serial_number, description, product_date, is_master, status, university_id, datetime, by_who, deleted

select
distinct
from lm_device
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into lm_device (device_category_id, department_id, batch, number, model, name, serial_number, description, product_date, is_master, status, university_id, datetime, by_who, deleted ) values (#{deviceCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{batch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isMaster,jdbcType=BIT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{universityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{byWho,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} )

mapper.update:
update lm_device
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
device_category_id = #{record.deviceCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
department_id = #{record.departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
batch = #{record.batch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
number = #{record.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model = #{record.model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial_number = #{record.serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_date = #{record.productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_master = #{record.isMaster,jdbcType=BIT},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
university_id = #{record.universityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
datetime = #{record.datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
by_who = #{record.byWho,jdbcType=BIGINT},
deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT},

update lm_device set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, device_category_id = #{record.deviceCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, department_id = #{record.departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, batch = #{record.batch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number = #{record.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{record.model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_number = #{record.serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_date = #{record.productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_master = #{record.isMaster,jdbcType=BIT}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, university_id = #{record.universityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, datetime = #{record.datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, by_who = #{record.byWho,jdbcType=BIGINT}, deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT}

update lm_device
device_category_id = #{deviceCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
batch = #{batch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_date = #{productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_master = #{isMaster,jdbcType=BIT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
university_id = #{universityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
datetime = #{datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
by_who = #{byWho,jdbcType=BIGINT},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update lm_device set device_category_id = #{deviceCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, batch = #{batch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_date = #{productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_master = #{isMaster,jdbcType=BIT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, university_id = #{universityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, datetime = #{datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, by_who = #{byWho,jdbcType=BIGINT}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select lm_device.id, device_category_id AS deviceCategoryId, department_id AS departmentId, batch, number, model, name, serial_number AS serialNumber, description, product_date AS productDate, is_master AS isMaster, status, lm_device.university_id AS universityId, lm_device.datetime, lm_device.by_who AS byWho, lm_device.deleted FROM lm_device, lm_lab_device WHERE lm_device.id = lm_lab_device.device_id AND lm_lab_device.lab_id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND lm_device.deleted = 0 AND lm_lab_device.deleted = 0

select lm_device.id, device_category_id AS deviceCategoryId, department_id AS departmentId, batch, number, model, name, serial_number AS serialNumber, description, product_date AS productDate, is_master AS isMaster, status, lm_device.university_id AS universityId, lm_device.datetime, lm_device.by_who AS byWho, lm_device.deleted FROM lm_device, lm_device_slave WHERE lm_device.id = lm_device_slave.slave_id AND lm_device_slave.master_id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND lm_device.deleted = 0 AND lm_device_slave.deleted = 0

SELECT distinct `name` FROM lm_device, lm_lab_device WHERE lm_lab_device.device_id = lm_device.id AND lm_lab_device.lab_id = #{labId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND lm_lab_device.deleted = 0 AND lm_device.deleted = 0
